summary: Adds a slightly powerful (custom) sword into the game on the table of the war planning room in Dragonsreach. It can be crafted into it's claymore version and back to it's longsword version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]*DISCLAIMER* - This is my first mod that adds new textures and meshes into the game. - *DISCLAIMER*[/color][/font][/size]


[size=6]About:
[/size][size=3]This mod adds a custom longsword and claymore into the game, good for early on games and possibly later games. They start with a smallish base damage but level with your weapon perks. Both the claymore and the longsword have the same enchantment of absorbing health.[/size]

[size=6]Location:
[/size][size=3]The longsword is located in the Dragonsreach warplanning room. The claymore version can be made in the forge simply by adding the longsword and 200 gold together. (You can change it back the same way)[/size][/center][center]
[size=6]Pose:[/size]
[size=3]From the new magic animations mod by xp32 :Â [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28428/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28428/?[/url]
[/center]
author: Plozmatix
